email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the low $51s? Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which I believe is competitive given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. However, could we adjust the laytime to 96 hours? Our loading operations might take a bit longer due to recent port congestion. Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Let me know your thoughts. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to 96 hours of laytime, but the demurrage rate is firm at $25,000 per day due to vessel operating costs. Let me know if this is acceptable, and we can proceed with the fixture. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Understood. Let’s proceed with the terms: $51.25 per metric ton, 96 hours laytime, and $25,000 demurrage per day. Please send over the fixture recap, and we’ll finalize on our end. Thanks for your flexibility. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, As discussed, please find the fixture recap below for the MV Ocean Star: - Commodity: Crude Oil - Load Port: Houston - Discharge Port: Rotterdam - Cargo Size: 150,000 MT - Freight Rate: $51.25 per MT - Laycan: 15-20 October - Laytime: 96 hours - Demurrage: $25,000 per day Let me know if everything looks correct, and we’ll proceed accordingly. Best regards, Sarah
